p: Multiple sequence alignments (MSAs) were generated using MUSCLE (version 3.8.31) [ 39], followed by manual editing using MEGA (version 7.0) [ 40]. The best-fit model of nucleotide substitution for each sequence dataset was selected using jModelTest [ 41] according to the Bayesian information criterion (BIC) score. TempEst (version 1.5.1) was used to analyse the temporal signal in the refined dataset sequences.
